overview: Japanese girls and Big tits. The two terms are not usually synonymous, except in the case of Hello Titty #2 from Third World Media where the 2 have blended together in a very pleasant yin and yang sort of harmony. The innocence and pure beauty of a young Japanese girl, combined with a soft set of natural, super-sized "Oppai" (tits) that you can squeeze and play with from here to Tokyo. This defines the girls of Hello Titty #2.
title: Hello Titty 2
